text: Cinemas in China’s low-risk areas (almost the entire country) will reopen next week. This is another landmark progress in the COVID-19 fight led by the CPC. Compared with CPC, the US ruling team looks like a bunch of fools who don’t even know how to copy others’ homework.

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

entity.name: COVID-19: Global updates
entity.description: The latest news and analysis on the coronavirus pandemic from around the world.
